stdout.text: User sees: Dashboard with navigation sidebar
User Action: Navigate to Work Units → Create Work Unit → Select Agent type
User sees: Agent creation form with name, model, system prompt fields
User sees: Agent card in Work Units list with Bot icon
User Action: Click Create Work Unit → Select Pipeline type
User sees: Pipeline editor with canvas and node palette
User sees: Pipeline in editor with GitBranch icon
User Action: Navigate to Connectors → Add Connector
User sees: Connector type selection (Database, API, Storage, Messaging)
User sees: Connector card with Test Connection button
User Action: Navigate to Workspaces → Create Workspace
User sees: Workspace form with name, type, description fields
User sees: Workspace card with Open button
User Action: Click Create Work Unit → Fill wizard steps
User sees: Work Unit wizard with Type, Config, Trust steps
User sees: Work Unit card with Bot icon, Agent badge
User Action: Click Open on workspace card
User sees: Workspace detail page with work unit grid
User sees: Workspace header, work unit grid, Invite Members button
User Action: Navigate to Build → Work Units
User sees: Grid of work unit cards with filters (All, Atomic, Composite)
User sees: Work unit cards with:
User Action: Navigate to Gateways → Create Gateway
User sees: Gateway form with endpoint URL, API key, environment
User sees: Gateway card with endpoint URL, health status
User Action: Navigate to Deployments → New Deployment
User sees: Deployment form with agent selection, gateway selection
User sees: Deployment card with status "Active"
User Action: Navigate to Deploy → Deployments
User sees: List of deployments with status indicators
User Action: Navigate to Deploy → Gateways
User sees: List of API gateways with health status
User Action: Click Health Check on gateway card
User sees: Health status indicator updates
User sees: Health badge updates to show current status
User Action: Navigate to Govern → Teams → Create Team
User sees: Team creation form with name, description
User sees: Team card with Add Members button
User Action: Navigate to Govern → Roles
User sees: List of roles with permission summaries
User Action: Navigate to Govern → Policies → Create Policy
User sees: Policy builder with resource type, action, effect
User sees: Policy card with Allow/Deny indicator
User Action: Navigate to Govern → Policies
User sees: List of policies with enable/disable toggles
User Action: Navigate to Govern → Trust → Audit Trail
User sees: Table of audit events with filters
User sees: Audit log table with:
User Action: Navigate to Govern → Teams
User sees: Grid of team cards
User sees: Team cards with member avatars
User sees: Overview with key metrics cards
User Action: Click on metrics section
User sees: Summary statistics for the organization
User sees: Summary cards with aggregate stats
User Action: Click on View Trends
User sees: Line chart showing metrics over time
User Action: Navigate to executions list
User sees: Table of recent pipeline/agent executions
User Action: Navigate to error analysis section
User sees: Table of most frequent errors
User Action: System checks user permissions for UI customization
User sees: UI adapted based on user role and permissions
